scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Credit Scoring Model
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data, such as income and address, from a publicly accessible credit scoring API.  The attack leverages a model inversion technique, feeding carefully crafted inputs to the API and observing the outputs to infer private information.
initial_goal: Develop a model to predict creditworthiness based on publicly available data.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking: A credit scoring API is used to assess loan applications. The API returns a credit score and probabilistic risk assessment, but does not return sensitive personal data directly.
